Text:
Plot: 

Roger is a reputed Norwegian scouts who lives in a wonderful house with his wife Diana, the beautiful owner of an art gallery. Actually, is living far beyond its means, if you can keep that pace of life is thanks to dedicated to stealing artworks. At a gallery opening, his wife introduces him to Clas Greve, who, besides being the perfect candidate for the position of CEO of the company Roger, owns a valuable painting. Roger sees that has come the opportunity to achieve economic independence and finally start planning the theft of the painting.
